summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from a US Attorney's Office employee, indicating they will be on leave the week of December 28, 2020, and providing contact instructions for urgent matters. The email subject references a New York Daily News article about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at a NYC jail.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the email subject line regarding a New York Daily News article about his final days at a NYC jail.

events.title: Out-of-office email sent
events.description: An employee of the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York sends an automatic reply indicating they are on leave.

keyFacts: The document is an automated out-of-office email reply from an employee at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email subject references a New York Daily News article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's final days at NYC jail revealed by inmates'.
The email was sent on December 28, 2020, and the sender indicates they will be on leave that week but checking email regularly.
